ygData.subject: Quest Question *some spoiler*
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone had any luck with the gnome wizard spare telescope lens quest?   I have talked to all 4 of the people. 2 say they have none at this time, the other
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone had any luck with the gnome wizard spare telescope lens quest?
�
I have talked to all 4 of the people. 2 say they have none at this time, the
other 2 send you on subquests.
�
The subquests aren't too much problem, as I know where to find the dark elf
that has the lens I need and the other is simply a matter of freeing the
right slave (I think... it may be more complicated than that, but I haven't
tried it yet)
�
My question is how do you get the other 2 to give you the lens? Other than
"come back in a few weeks" I haven't been able to get anything out of them.
